trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of all [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) elements in a project.
Adds a new [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element to the end of the project.
The `Name` attribute of the new `Target` element.
A object representing the created Target element.

Copies the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> object in the collection represents a element in the project.
An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> objects in the collection.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> exists in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
The `Name` attribute of the Target element to search for.
`true` if the Target element exists; otherwise, `false`.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection>.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
`true` if access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"></xref> object in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> object represents a `Target` element in the project.
The `Name` attribute of the Target element in the collection.
The object that contains the property value specified by index.
Removes the specified [Target](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/350f6fc2-86b3-45f2-a31e-ece0e6bd4dca) element from the project.
The `Name` attribute of the `Target` element to remove.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"></xref>.
